resources.string: Select an item from the list, scroll as needed.
This is an example of a simple app. It has the following features:
One Main Activity with two Fragments
Fragments are loaded at the onCreate of the app
The List Fragment has a RecyclerView to present a list of items
The items come from a LinkedListMap handled by a Key
The Items data is contained in a POJO
There is no Fragment Communication nor Listeners or Database features
